description: This file defines a React functional component for the home page of the EduVantage platform. It includes UI elements such as buttons that navigate to different routes based on user interaction and feature flags, and it imports several internal services and components.

methods.name: Home()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the home page with call-to-action buttons for 'Get Started' and 'Explore'.

methods.name: onGetStarted
methods.description: Asynchronous handler invoked when the 'Get Started' button is clicked; logs an event, performs a health check API call, and navigates to the '/signup' route.

methods.name: onExplore
methods.description: Handler invoked when the 'Explore' button is clicked; checks a feature flag and navigates accordingly to '/dashboard' or '/feed'.
